TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrincipalSearcher extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 封裝對基礎主體存放區執行查詢時使用的方法和搜尋模式。

span.span: Encapsulates the methods and search patterns used to execute a query against the underlying principal store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用預設頁面大小為 256 KB 時類別的網域主體執行查詢。The default page size of 256 KB is used when the class performs a query for domain principals. 應用程式進行設定，可能會覆寫某些預設值屬性中的基礎從傳回的物件方法。The application may override the default value by setting the property in the underlying object that is returned from the method.

span.span: Query by Example

span.span: The property must be set before the Principal searcher object can be used to perform a search.

System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Namespace Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As PrincipalContext

summary.span: 取得用來執行查詢的主體內容。

span.span: Gets that principal context that is used to perform the query.

summary.span: 這個內容會指定要執行搜尋作業的伺服器或網域。

span.span: The context specifies the server or domain against which search operations are performed.

value.span: 物件，指定要執行作業的伺服器或網域。

span.span: The object that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性所含的物件取自設定的主體物件的 context 屬性屬性。The object contained in this property is obtained from the context property of the principal object set in the property. 查詢會執行使用主體內容物件中指定的認證，且容器中指定屬性。Queries are performed using the credentials specified in the principal context object and the container specified in the property. 針對和內容型別，容器是辨別名稱 (DN) 容器物件。For and context types, the container is the Distinguished Name (DN) of a container object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> FindAll() cil managed
Public Function FindAll () As PrincipalSearchResult(Of Principal)

summary.span: 傳回主體搜尋結果，其中包含符合查詢篩選條件屬性中指定之主體的所有主體物件的集合。

span.span: Returns a principal search result that contains a collection of all the principal objects that match the principal specified in the query filter property.

returns.span: 符合查詢篩選條件的 物件，如果找不到結果則為空集合。

span.span: A object that matches the query filter or an empty collection if no results are found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回主體搜尋結果比對中所含物件的類型的主體物件屬性。The principal objects returned in the principal search result match the type of object contained in the property. 在指定的內容中執行搜尋屬性。The search is conducted in the context specified in the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱＜依範例查詢＞概觀主題。For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic.

span.span: The contains referential properties.

exception.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱＜依範例查詢＞概觀主題。

span.span: For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic.
The is a persisted principal.

exception.span: 必須先指派給主體搜尋器，才能執行查詢。

span.span: A must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.

System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Namespace Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal FindOne() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回主體搜尋結果，其中包含第一個找到符合 屬性中指定之主體的主體物件。

span.span: Returns a principal search result that contains the first principal object found that matches the principal specified in the property.

returns.span: 物件，包含符合查詢篩選條件的主體物件，如果找不到結果則為 null。

span.span: A object that contains the principal object that matches the query filter or null if no results are found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有在指定的物件只有一個相符項目，這個方法會傳回該物件。If there is exactly one match of the object specified in the , this method returns that object. 如果有多個相符的物件，這個方法會任意傳回其中一個相符的主體。If there are multiple matches of the object, this method arbitrarily returns one of the matching principals. 從這個方法傳回的物件中所含物件的型別對應屬性。The object returned from this method matches the type of object contained in the property. 在指定的內容中執行搜尋屬性。The search is conducted in the context specified in the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[依範例查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)的概觀主題。For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic.

span.span: The contains referential properties.

exception.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[依範例查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)的概觀主題。

span.span: For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic.
The is a persisted principal.

exception.span: 必須先指派給主體搜尋器，才能執行查詢。

span.span: A must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.
Query by Example
System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Namespace Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetUnderlyingSearcher() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回帳戶管理 API 執行搜尋時所使用的基礎搜尋物件。

span.span: Returns the underlying search object that is used by the Account Management API to perform the search.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以修改的屬性直接在之前執行的查詢物件。The application can modify the properties directly on the object before executing the query. 查詢會使用已修改的屬性，然後執行。The query will then execute using the modified properties. 例如，使用預設頁面大小為 256 KB 時類別會執行的查詢主體。For example, the default page size of 256 KB is used when the class performs a query for principals. 應用程式進行設定，可能會覆寫某些預設值屬性，在基礎從這個方法傳回的物件。The application may override the default value by setting the property in the underlying object that is returned from this method.

exception.span: 必須先指派給主體搜尋器，才能執行查詢。

span.span: A must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.
The contains referential properties.

exception.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[依範例查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)的概觀主題。

span.span: For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic.
The is a persisted principal.
Query by Example

System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Namespace Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::Principal ^ QueryFilter { System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::Principal ^ get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::Principal ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於找出相符主體的查詢篩選條件。

span.span: Gets or sets the query filter that is used to locate matching principals.

value.span: 用於查詢的 物件，如果未設定篩選條件則為 null。

span.span: The object that is used for the query or null if no filter is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性中包含之主體物件可以是任何類型的物件衍生自主要類別： 電腦、 使用者或群組。The principal object contained in this property can be any type of object derived from the principal class: computer, user, or group. 也可以擴充的主要型別所定義的其中一個擴充， ，或。The can also be an extended principal type that is defined by extending either , , or . 在衍生的類別物件傳遞給這個屬性的類型會決定查詢的物件類型。The type of the derived class object that is passed to this property determines the type of object that is queried. 產生的查詢包含指定的主體物件上設定的所有屬性的邏輯 AND。The resulting query contains a logical AND of all the properties set on the specified principal object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[依範例查詢](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb384378)的概觀主題。For more information, see the [Query by Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb384378) overview topic. 如需有關擴充類別的詳細資訊，請參閱[主體擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概觀主題。For more information on the extended classes, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.

exception.span: 保存的主體物件不能做為 。

span.span: Persisted Principal objects can not be used as the .

exception.span: 不可為 null 或空白。

span.span: The cannot be null or empty.
